int main()
{

    int a[5000];
    for(int x = 0; x < n; x++)
        scanf("%d", &a[x]);

    // Initialize the DP map for the first element.
    map<long long, long long> dp;
    // Try t_1 from -2 to 2.
    for (int t = -2; t <= 2; t++) {
        long long b = (long long)t * a[0];
        long long moves = abs(t);
        // Only add if this is the first entry or improves the moves for this b.
        if (dp.find(b) == dp.end() || moves < dp[b]) {
            dp[b] = moves;
        }

        map<long long, long long> next_dp;
        long long current_a = a[i];
        for (auto& entry : dp) {
            long long prev_b = entry.first;
            long long prev_moves = entry.second;

            // Compute the minimal t_i for current step.
            double q = (double)prev_b / current_a;
            long long t_i;
            if (q < 0) {
                t_i = 0;
            } else {
                if (q == (long long)q) {
                    // q is integer.
                    t_i = (long long)q + 1;
                } else {
                    t_i = (long long)ceil(q);

            // Compute the new b_i and moves.
            long long new_b = t_i * current_a;
            long long new_moves = prev_moves + abs(t_i);

            // Update next_dp.
            if (next_dp.find(new_b) == next_dp.end() || new_moves < next_dp[new_b]) {
                next_dp[new_b] = new_moves;
            }
        }
        dp = next_dp;
    }

    // Find the minimal moves in the final dp.
    long long ans = LLONG_MAX;
    for (auto& entry : dp) {
        if (entry.second < ans) {
            ans = entry.second;
        }
    }
    printf("%lld\n", ans);
    return 0;
}
